entries.femaleVariant: Balance. Keeps Night City alive. Without it, we'd all be at each other's throats – corps, gangs, mercs, everyone.
And where do fixers fit in? If one side starts to get too much power, a fixer can help tip the scales toward the other – discreetly.
Think about it – balance keeps biz from running dry. Anyway, why the lecture, right?
Because it's time for a little intervention. Check the attachment.
